info.author: Nathan Urwin
info.description:
setupmyos
=========

Automate all the things

Features
--------

-  `Python Fabric Library Custom Implementation`_
-  `Python Fabric Task Runner for Python Django`_
-  `Setup My Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS Server OS`_

Upcoming
~~~~~~~~

-  `Setup My Debian 9 Desktop OS`_
-  `Setup My Windows 10 Desktop OS`_
-  `Setup My macOS 10.13 Desktop OS`_

Requirements
------------

-  `Debian 9`_
-  `Python 2`_
-  `pip`_ or `pipenv`_
-  `fabric`_ (auto-installed)
-  `pytz`_ (auto-installed)

Installation
------------

.. code:: bash

    pip install setupmyos

Usage
-----

Create a ``fabfile.py`` in the root, or top-level, of your Django
project:

.. code:: python

    from setupmyos import (clean, config, create, delete, deploy, install, local,
      reboot, remote, reset, restart, ssh, test, uninstall)

Then you can ``fab -l`` and ``fab install``.

Development
-----------

See `CONTRIBUTING`_
